mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(title, content, wdate, boardType, memberId, memberNickname) VALUES(#{title},#{content},NOW(),#{boardType}, #{memberId}, #{memberNickname})
mapper.select:
select boardNo, boardType, title, memberId, memberNickname, wdate from board
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') AND boardType="후기게시판"
AND CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') AND boardType="후기게시판"
order by boardNo desc LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{endIndex}
SELECT * FROM board where boardNo<#{boardNo} and boardType="후기게시판" ORDER BY boardNo DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM board where boardNo>#{boardNo} and boardType="후기게시판" ORDER BY boardNo LIMIT 1
SELECT max(boardNo) FROM board WHERE boardType="후기게시판"
SELECT min(boardNo) FROM board WHERE boardType="후기게시판"
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content} WHERE boardNo=#{boardNo}
